import java.util.Scanner;

public class Main {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);
		int a = sc.nextInt();
		int b = sc.nextInt();
		int sum = 0;
		for(int i=1;i<=b;i++) {
			int c = sc.nextInt();
			int d = sc.nextInt();
			sum += c*d;
		}
		if(a==sum) {
			System.out.println("Yes");
		}else {
			System.out.println("No");
		}
	}

}
